name: Gramin Vikas Avam Takniki Anusandhan Sansthan
briefDescription: ग्रामीण विकास एवं तकनीक अनुसन्धान संस्थान (Institute for Rural Development & Technical Research) is non religious,  non political, non profit, non partition and secular, conducted with method of republican and transparent, nongovernmental voluntary  organization. This organization registered under Rajasthan Societies Registration Act 1958. It was evolved an a auspicious day, Gandhi, Shastri  Jayanti  02 October 2002 But legal entity under  Rajasthan Societies Registration Act in year 2005, having the registration No. 80/Baran/2005-06 Date 11/11/2005. It was joint efforts of youths inspired by the spirit of commitment and dedication. There emotional response, moral commitment and social responsibility to read them to join handed together for contributing  their mite to mitigate social and other problems in general and development of under privileged in particular. Institute for Rural Development & Technical Research accept bare of  (5 J) Jal, Jangal, Jameen,  Jeeve and Janmanas . Working for Utilization of Industrial waste, Disability, Water & Environment, Income generation, sanitation, Rural Development.  Women Empowerment, Education and Social Equality. Institute for Rural Development & Technical Research have conducted in 05 branch offices in Rajasthan state is  Baran, Kota, Jhalawar,  Jaipur & Udaipur.
